titleStmt.title: An act touching the moneys and coyns of England
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: "Die Martis, 17 Julii, 1649. Ordered by the Commons assembled in Parliament, that this Act be forthwith printed and published. [countersigned] Hen: Scobell, Cleric Parliament."
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
